#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;

typedef unsigned long long int Lint;

int main() {
	
	Lint n, m, i, j, count;
	
		scanf("%llu", &n );
		vector<bool> A( n + 1, true );
		
		A[ 0 ] = A[ 1 ] = false;
		
		for( i = 2; ( i * i ) <= n;i++ ) {
		
			for( j= ( i * i );j <= n;j += i )
				if( A[ j ] )
					A[ j ] = false;	
		}
		
		if( n <= 1 )
			count = 0;
		else {
			
			count = 2;
			
			for( i = 3;i <= n;i += 2)	
				if( A[ i ] )
					count += i;
		}

		printf("%llu\n", count );
	
	return 0;
}
